overview:
As Senior Vice President of Engineering, Rajeev brings to EQAL a wealth of technology, engineering management and product development experience. He has served in lead engineering and product development roles in companies like Netscape, Earthlink, LowerMyBills, EverBridge, Snap.com and various technology startups. Earlier in his career, he architected the portal application at Earthlink and scaled the infrastructure to serve of millions of page views a day. His has worked on a wide range of technologies ranging from TCP/IP stacks to decision engines to web application frameworks. Over the course of his engineering career, he has engineered highly scalable online applications for a variety of businesses including knowledge based systems, direct response, content management systems, telephony applications, and online advertising systems.

Rajeev graduated with honors from University of Madras, India with a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science. He loves spending time with his family and friends. He regularly plays basketball and tennis, and enjoys most outdoor sports
